casebody.data:
BP EXPLORATION & PRODUCTION INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
LAKE EUGENIE LAND & DEVELOPMENT, INC., et al.; and BP Exploration & Production Inc., et al., petitioners,
v.
Bon Secour Fisheries, Inc., et al. No. 14-123. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 8, 2014.

Opinion

Motion of Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of Mobile Area Chamber of Commerce, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Federation of German Industries, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
